hero.headline: Online Services
hero.byline: Choose the best interaction format that suits your needs

miniConsultation.name: Mini Consultation
features: Simple solutions for difficult moments in makeup application
Personalized recommendations on products, techniques, and skincare

makeupBag.name: Makeup Bag Review + Product Selection
features: Analysis of your current makeup bag via questionnaire
Personalized selection of makeup and skincare products for skin preparation
Recommendations on brushes and other tools

videoLesson.name: Online Video Lesson (Workshop)
features: Joint makeup session via video call on a chosen topic
Step-by-step instructions for express/day/evening/smoky or other makeup
Detailed explanations and demonstration of techniques in real time
Practical tips on products, application, and working methods

premiumPackage.name: Premium Package: Makeup for Yourself
features: All-inclusive: introductory consultation; makeup bag review, personalized product selection, and three online lessons with different makeup looks of your choice
Lessons with detailed explanations and technique demonstrations
Support throughout the month: answers to your questions
Personalized approach: you get a working system tailored to you
